intro: Limonium johannis, commonly known as the sea holly, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is characterized by its striking blue or purple flowers and silver-gray foliage. The plant typically grows in coastal areas and saline soils, showcasing its adaptability to harsh environments. Limonium johannis is a perennial herb that thrives in full sun and well-drained soil. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for gardens and floral arrangements.
